name: PageCrumbs
author: Jeff Manning / Think Forward Media

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/pagecrumbs directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Add Post Support

1.0.3

  • Test on latest verison of WordPress

1.0.2

  • Home Page bug showed Home / Home

1.0.1

  • Fixes to readme

1.0.0

  • inital release
sections.description: PageCrumbs is a simple way to display breadcrumbs on your website. Show nested pages in an easy to read format.

short_description: PageCrumbs is a simple way to display breadcrumbs on your website. Show nested pages in an easy to read format.
